description:
Legendary weapons for your SAMURAI WARRIORS officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Yukimura Sanada, Kenshin Uesugi, Kunoichi, Shingen Takeda, Kanetsugu Naoe, Kotarō Fūma, Kai, Ujiyasu Hōjō, Aya, Nobuyuki Sanada, Kagekatsu Uesugi, and Lady Hayakawa

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Samurai Warriors Pack 4
